response.overview: Restarting ones life is a challenge that every man considers at least once, whether he wants to admit it or not. Why, you may ask? Because the thought of a new beginning brings up all kinds of new possibilities. Of course not without tying loose ends, like the presence of a needy ex-wife. But when it is done, new dates, pretty new colleagues and countless new opportunities for sex show up on the horizon. How would you handle a restart?
response.title: Restart
